stats.title: Our Growing Community

positions.title: Join Our Team
positions.subtitle: Discover exciting opportunities to be part of Taiwan's digital nomad community and help bridge cultures through meaningful events and connections.
positions.tryDifferentSearch: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria
positions.ctaDescription: We're always looking for passionate individuals to join our mission. Reach out and let's discuss how you can contribute to our community.

responsibilities: Lead event planning and execution for community gatherings
Coordinate with venues, speakers, and sponsors
Build relationships with local and international partners
Develop marketing strategies for community growth
Manage social media presence and content creation
Drive partnership and sponsorship opportunities
Host bilingual events and facilitate networking
Bridge communication between international and local attendees
Create engaging and inclusive event experiences
Welcome and register event attendees
Provide information and assistance to participants
Coordinate with event team for smooth operations
Capture high-quality photos during events
Edit and deliver photos for marketing use
Document community moments and networking activities
Create engaging short-form video content
Film and edit event highlights and testimonials
Develop video content for social media platforms
Coordinate food and beverage arrangements for events
Manage vendor relationships and catering logistics
Ensure dietary requirements and preferences are met
Support event setup and breakdown activities
Assist with registration and attendee management
Help coordinate logistics and on-site operations

footer.socialPrompt: Stay connected with our community and get the latest updates on opportunities in Taiwan.

techHub.title: Tech Innovation Hub

culture.title: Rich Cultural Heritage

location.title: Strategic Gateway
location.description: Perfect location to explore Asia-Pacific markets with excellent connectivity and business-friendly environment.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Taiwan Journey?
